entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -10.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
